thread.section_title: Hotel Augustin - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, helpful staff for 120 Euros per night
thread.title_full: Good location, helpful staff for 120 Euros per night - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LiviaLS
title: Good location, helpful staff for 120 Euros per night
text:
The hotel has a good location in the city center from Paris just 10 minutes walk from a train station.
The staff was very helpful and polite.
The breakfast was good as they have salad fruit, good cheese and marmalade the only thing that could be better is the coffee/cappuccino.
The mini bar is for free and there is a lunch break everyday also for free.
At night the room was a bit loud and I could hear when a door was opened or closed.
For the price I have expected exactly this kind of service and cleanness.
